name: NVL
description: NVL - an amazing adventure game in the genre of RPG. An interesting combat turn-based system as in JRPG. Beautiful anime girls with pantsu.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 15.5 Ghz or faster Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
